definitions.text: people who are condemned to eternal punishment
examples: he felt he had visited the realm of the damned

definitions.text: wish harm upon; invoke evil upon
examples: The bad witch cursed the child
I'll be damned (or blessed or darned or goddamned) if I'll do any such thing
he's a damn (or goddam or goddamned) fool

definitions.text: in danger of the eternal punishment of Hell

examples: kindly Arthur--so damnably , politely , endlessly persistent!
